title: Money spent while attending music festivals in the United Kingdom 2015 to 2016
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 8 lines namely Less than 10 British pounds, 10-50 British pounds, 50-100 British pounds, 100-150 British pounds, 150-200 British pounds, 250-300 British pounds, 300-350 British pounds, and Over 350 British pounds. The y axis represents Share of respondents and the x axis represents Year.

Overall 100-150 British pounds is gradually increasing, 150-200 British pounds is gradually decreasing, Less than 10 British pounds, 10-50 British pounds, 50-100 British pounds, 250-300 British pounds, 300-350 British pounds, and Over 350 British pounds are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, 50-100 British pounds mostly maintained the highest Share of respondents when compared to others with a mean value of 25.7, and it peaked at 2016.
After 50-100 British pounds, 100-150 British pounds overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 21.6, peaking at 2016.
The botommost line, Less than 10 British pounds,  has a mean of 2.2, and peaked at 2015.
